subtitle.Text: Oh my god. You are so lucky you finished high school before we moved into this house.
So, it's the first day of school, and there I am, introducing myself to the class, and I say that I just moved into the house on Arbor Hill.
All of a sudden EVERY kid in the room turns and just STARES like I suddenly transformed into a mutant.
I just stood there, wishing pretty hard for a rewind button.
Because now maybe nobody knows my name, but they all know who I am: "The Psycho House Girl." Great.
